description: This file defines a Button component for a Lightning JS application. The button is focusable, displays a label, and handles click and focus events, with custom styling based on theme.

classes.name: Component
classes.description: A Lightning JS component representing a focusable button with customizable label, size, and callback.

methods.name: state
methods.description: Initializes component state with default styling and behavior properties.

methods.name: onInit
methods.description: Sets up the component state based on incoming props during initialization.

methods.name: onEnter
methods.description: Handles focus entry event, invokes the onPress callback if provided.

methods.name: onClick
methods.description: Handles click events, invokes the onPress callback if provided.
